div.a: What Science Says About Gun Control And Violent Crime

div.div: Does gun control mean fewer guns on the street and less violence? Does encouraging gun ownership mean better protected people and less violence?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VGNpMH&via=Digg&text=What Science Says About Gun Control And Violent Crime

div.a: Fox News Blames Shooting On 'Online Activities,' 'Gaming'

div.div: Fox News anchor Megyn Kelly and analyst Keith Ablow got together on the network today to chat about some of the factors in today's tragic shooting in Connecticut.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QYSBhW&via=Digg&text=Fox News Blames Shooting On 'Online Activities,' 'Gaming'

div.a: Enormous Asteroid's Earth Flyby Caught On Video

div.div: A new video captures the giant asteroid tumbling through space on its flyby of Earth earlier this week.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VGJrDA&via=Digg&text=Enormous Asteroid's Earth Flyby Caught On Video

div.a: Internet Identifies, Threatens Wrong Man As Newtown Shooter

div.div: In the media’s rush to find out information on the suspected Newtown, Connecticut, school shooter, numerous news outlets misidentified a Facebook page belonging to someone with a similar name. Denunciations and even death threats quickly accumulated.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QYQrPA&via=Digg&text=Internet Identifies, Threatens Wrong Man As Newtown Shooter

div.div: Five years ago, Reuters photographer Carolina Camps documented the stories found in the maternity wing of a women's prison in Los Hornos, Argentina. The prison not only housed female inmates, it was also home to 63 of their children, who were allowed to live with their mothers inside the jail until they were four years old. Now, half a decade on, Camps tracked down four of the women to see what had become of them and of their young families.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SpXBOs&via=Digg&text=Raised Behind Bars

div.div: IF YOU DON'T KNOW WHO HE IS, BING HIM
Ray Kurzweil confirmed today that he will be joining Google to work on new projects involving machine learning and language processing.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UN9ZCn&via=Digg&text=Ray Kurzweil Joins Google

div.div: The problem with "The Hobbit" isn’t that it fails to be "Lord of the Rings"; it’s that it tries so unbelievably hard to be when it isn’t, not in its style, characters, or scale.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Ug4y0m&via=Digg&text=An Unexpected Failure

div.div: Today a .223 caliber Bushmaster rifle was discovered at the scene of the killings at Sandy Hook Elementary. It's still unclear whether this gun was actually fired, but here's a video of the weapon in action.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VGN5xo&via=Digg&text=This Is A .223-Caliber Rifle

div.div: A gunman killed 26 people, 20 of them children between the ages of 5 and 10, in a shooting on Friday morning at an elementary school in Newtown, Conn., about 65 miles northeast of New York City, the authorities said.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UYbWk2&via=Digg&text=27 Dead In School Massacre

div.div: NO ONE TOLD HIM PRINT IS DEAD?

div.a: Programmer Creates 8,000 Books Using An Algorithm

div.div: When we think about writing books, especially the very technical kind, we think about a person or small group of people hunched over their keyboards typing away. There’s a good reason for that mental image: that’s how the majority of books are written. That’s not the way it has to be, though.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Wc6F72&via=Digg&text=Programmer Creates 8,000 Books Using An Algorithm

div.div: The rise of social and cell phone gaming, coupled with increasing options vying for the customers' time, have introduced a wave of disruption into the gaming industry, siphoning off customers and reducing the amount of time gamers devote to their old-guard systems. Is there a way for console makers to survive?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SooHp9&via=Digg&text=Rebooting The Gaming Industry

div.div: "Sexy Baby," a new documentary film about “sexiness in the cyber age,” investigates a new sexual landscape where “having pubic hair is considered unattractive,” most young people “know someone who has emailed or texted a naked photo of themselves,” and many kids “have accidentally or intentionally had their first introduction to sex be via hardcore online porn.”

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VGK1Bo&via=Digg&text=What Hath Internet Porn Wrought?

div.a: AMC To Air Every Episode Of 'The Walking Dead' In Black And White

div.div: If you’ve watched even one episode of 'The Walking Dead,' you know blood is on the agenda. Usually it’s spraying or gushing. But unlike the show, Robert Kirkman’s comic is actually presented in black and white. So the channel has decided to give us a special treat by airing the episodes the same way.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UhLQW5&via=Digg&text=AMC To Air Every Episode Of 'The Walking Dead' In Black And White

div.a: Photos From The Scene Of The Sandy Hook Shooting

div.div: As photos come in, more becomes clear about this morning's graphic shooting in Connecticut.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UY2DjQ&via=Digg&text=Photos From The Scene Of The Sandy Hook Shooting

div.a: Tips For Talking To Children About The Elementary School Mass Shooting

div.div: First, find out what they have heard. Through Facebook, Twitter, or friends, most youngsters will know about the mass shooting that took place on Friday morning at an elementary school in Newtown, Conn.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UYgqam&via=Digg&text=Tips For Talking To Children About The Elementary School Mass Shooting

div.a: Police Determine Apple Store Tasering Was 'Justified'

div.div: After reviewing an incident in which a 44-year-old woman was tasered for allegedly refusing to leave an Apple store, police conclude the act was "justified and appropriate."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VFLmZu&via=Digg&text=Police Determine Apple Store Tasering Was 'Justified'

div.div: If given the opportunity, we’re sure most Lord of the Rings fans would love to move into ‘Bag End’—the iconic home of Bilbo and Frodo Baggins. But before you start packing, Movoto Real Estate has created an infographic that highlights the cost of purchasing the famous hobbit hole.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/12pjy13&via=Digg&text=Infographic: A Hobbit’s Home Value

div.a: Man Attacks 22 Children With Knife In China

div.div: A knife-wielding man injured 22 children and one adult outside a primary school in central China as students were arriving for classes Friday, police said.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VGPiJg&via=Digg&text=Man Attacks 22 Children With Knife In China

div.div: Wow, of the 12 deadliest shooting attacks in US history, six have occurred since 2007. washingtonpost.com/wp-srv/... h/t @DLeonhardt

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/PsjZCO&via=Digg&text=The Deadliest US Shootings

div.a: Adorable Beagle Diagnoses Deadly Infections By Sniffing You

div.div: Cliff the beagle can sniff out a dangerous bacterium just by smelling patients--no stool sample or long lab analysis necessary.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Z6d09y&via=Digg&text=Adorable Beagle Diagnoses Deadly Infections By Sniffing You

div.a: Camouflage Company Claims It Created Perfect Invisibility Cloak

div.div: A Canadian company called Hyperstealth is reporting that it has developed Quantum Stealth, a material that renders the target “completely invisible by bending light waves around the target.”

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VF2qyA&via=Digg&text=Camouflage Company Claims It Created Perfect Invisibility Cloak

div.a: The Worst Day Of His Life

div.div: Ten years after winning the biggest single undivided jackpot in lottery history, Jack Whittaker wishes he’d have torn up his ticket and thrown away the pieces.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UI57yo&via=Digg&text=The Worst Day Of His Life

div.a: A Hypnotic Timelapse Video Of A Supercomputer Being Built

div.div: To give you an appreciation of how much work goes into putting a supercomputer together, here's a timelapse video of one being put together at the Australian National University.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WarFLy&via=Digg&text=A Hypnotic Timelapse Video Of A Supercomputer Being Built

div.div: TODAY, DESCRIBED AS ONLY THE ONION CAN

Following the fatal shooting this morning at a Connecticut elementary school that left at least 27 dead, including 20 small children, sources across the nation shook their heads, stifled a sob in their voices, and reported f*ck everything. Just f*ck it all to hell.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/12qargA&via=Digg&text=F*ck Everything, Nation Reports

div.a: A Look Inside Russia's Airplane Graveyard

div.div: Nine thousand of the hulking Cold War wrecks can be seen at the vast plane and helicopter graveyard at Russia's largest aviation museum. Among them are some of the former Communist regime's greatest achievements in air travel, that have since been superseded many times and rendered redundant.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TYLZRq&via=Digg&text=A Look Inside Russia's Airplane Graveyard

div.div: SHALE GAS TOO DIFFICULT TO CARRY

div.a: Why Does Santa Give Coal To Bad Kids?

div.div: Obviously, because they’ve been naughty, and not nice. But why coal, specifically?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Zq59CN&via=Digg&text=Why Does Santa Give Coal To Bad Kids?

div.a: McAfee: Bath Salts Are For Poor People

div.div: John McAfee, the former anti-virus impresario who is wanted by police in Belize for questioning in the murder of his neighbor, is now in Miami, and he’s giving interviews.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SoBl7H&via=Digg&text=McAfee: Bath Salts Are For Poor People

div.a: The Fine Art Of Italian Hand Gestures

div.div: A pocket guide to Neapolitan nonverbal communication.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XWH5qD&via=Digg&text=The Fine Art Of Italian Hand Gestures

div.a: Here's What Happens When A Piano Is Abandoned On The Streets Of Manhattan

div.div: The sight of a lone piano on the sidewalk can be both sad and beautiful. So when Anthony Sherin noticed that someone had left a piano in front of his apartment, he decided to document what happened to it.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SUwGaf&via=Digg&text=Here's What Happens When A Piano Is Abandoned On The Streets Of Manhattan

div.a: Why Did Google Just Fix The iPhone's Major Flaw?

div.div: By releasing new versions of Google Maps and Gmail for iOS this month, Google helped make the iPhone the best mobile phone on the planet. Why is Google, the owner of Android and Motorola, helping its ostensible rival?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Z3BxMH&via=Digg&text=Why Did Google Just Fix The iPhone's Major Flaw?
